title: SAP Service Insights
description: we don't use description, I wonder where this shows up?
background: This scenario uses ITSI SAP Service Intelligence to automatically build SAP services and KPIs to monitor SAP via PowerConnect
learning_objective: ITSI Service Analyzer and deep dive

phrasings.question_phrasing: What KPI degraded to critical state first within the M74:ABAP:IDOCs Service
phrasings.answer_guidance: Include all characters from the KPI
phrasings.learning_objective: ITSI Service Analyzer and deep dive

phrasings.question_phrasing: At what time did the Service M74:ABAP:TRFC (aka the Queueing service) breach 1000 failed Remote Function Calls
phrasings.answer_guidance: Round to the nearest five minutes and include am/pm e.g. 1:16 am would be 01:15 am

phrasings.question_phrasing: SAP Systems send JSON data and self identify by putting the SAP Instance system name into the source field. How many SAP systems sent data?
phrasings.answer_guidance: Use numbers to answer e.g. 8 not eight
phrasings.learning_objective: SPL and SAP data format and contents

hints.hint: Data is in the sap index
Only include sources in JSON format
